title: 6.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
The table below shows the marks scored by Sana in five different subjects in four weekly tests.

Use Excel to fi nd out in which week did Sana score the lowest marks.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
